Chess club.name: Chess Club
Chess club.description: A welcoming environment for chess newbies all the way up to pros!

Math club.name: Math Club
Math club.description: Come join us for new group math puzzles every week!

CU Boxing.name: CU Boxing
CU Boxing.description: We're a strong team of committed fighters looking to grow! Waiver needed before sparring.

CU Disk Golf.name: CU Disk Golf
CU Disk Golf.description: Open to alums and current student! Tournament qualifiers every March, weekly games open to all.

CU Poetry Society.name: CU Poetry Society
CU Poetry Society.description: If you long to savor beauty's nectar, bring an open heart to our weekly lecture!

Cornerstone Other-Serve.name: Cornerstone Other-Serve
Cornerstone Other-Serve.description: ...Because we aren't created to self-serve! Explore God's calling for you with Prof. Thomas Aquinas.

CU Smash.name: CU Smash
CU Smash.description: SETTLE IT IN SMASH! SP/ FA brackets sign ups are due on drop-add.

Mindfulness.name: Mindfulness
Mindfulness.description: Aixous? Overloaded? On-edge? Just... breathe. We host beginner sessions TR by the pond. Come learn to let go and let God!
